amendatorysection.para: Any telecommunications company or its agent who fails or neglects to comply with section 86-131, 86-132, 86-140, 86-141, or 86-153 or who violates any of the provisions of such sections is guilty of a Class IV misdemeanor.

crossreference.para: Free or underpriced telephone service furnished to municipal officers, prohibited, see sections 18-305 and 18-312.
